net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Class AbstractTreeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.AbstractTreeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataColumnTreeModel, TreeNodeTreeModel

    public abstract class AbstractTreeModel
extends Object
implements TreeModel
    Abstract TreeModel that defines event firing methods.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • canColumnSort

        public boolean canColumnSort(int columnIndex)
        Returns false. Determine if a column can be sorted. Sorting must be implemented in a subclass, the Tree will not perform sorting.
        Specified by:
        canColumnSort in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        true if the column can be sorted, false otherwise.

      • fireTreeNodesChanged

        protected void fireTreeNodesChanged(Object source,
                        Object[] path,
                        int[] childIndices,
                        Object[] children)
        Fire an event to all listeners that indicates nodes have changed.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        path - The path of the root of the nodes that have changed.
        childIndices - The child indicies of the nodes under the path that have changed.
        children - The child nodes under the path that have changed.

      • fireTreeNodesInserted

        protected void fireTreeNodesInserted(Object source,
                         Object[] path,
                         int[] childIndices,
                         Object[] children)
        Fire an event to all listeners that indicates nodes have been inserted.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        path - The path of the root of the nodes that have been inserted.
        childIndices - The child indicies of the nodes under the path that have been inserted.
        children - The child nodes under the path that have been inserted.

                        Object[] path,

                        Object[] children)
        Fire an event to all listeners that indicates nodes have been removed.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.

      • fireTreeStructureChanged

        protected void fireTreeStructureChanged(Object source,
                            Object[] path,
                            int[] childIndices,
                            Object[] children)
        Fire an event to all listeners that indicates nodes below the given nodes have been changed in too complex a way to indicate using insert/remove event.
        Parameters:
        source - The source of the event.
        path - The path of the root of the nodes that have changed.
        childIndices - The child indicies of the nodes under the path that have changed.
        children - The child nodes under the path that have changed.

      • getColumnClass

        public Class getColumnClass(int columnIndex)
        Returns Object.class. Returns the most specific superclass for all the cell values in the column. This will be used to select default cell renders and editors.
        Specified by:
        getColumnClass in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        The Class of the column.

      • getColumnCount

        public int getColumnCount()
        Returns 1. Returns the number of columns in the model.
        Specified by:
        getColumnCount in interface TreeModel
        Returns:
        The number of columns.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getColumnOrdering

        public SortOrder getColumnOrdering(int columnIndex)
        Returns SortOrder.NONE. Get the ordering of the column.
        Specified by:
        getColumnOrdering in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        An SortOrder instance indicating the current sort order for the column.

      • getNodeId

        public String getNodeId(Object node)
        Returns null.

        Get an unique ID for the node. This ID will be used in some mediums to find the node in the case where the model and user interface become inconsistent.

        This method may return null if not supported.

        Specified by:
        getNodeId in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        node - The tree node.
        Returns:
        String or null if no ID is available.

      • getValueAt

        public Object getValueAt(TreePath path,
                int columnIndex)
        Returns the last component of the path if the column index is zero, otherwise returns null. Returns the value for the cell at columnIndex and path. Column zero should return an object that is either the same or equal to the object returned by getChild() or equivalently path. getLastPathComponent().
        Specified by:
        getValueAt in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the node.
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        The value object.

      • isCellEditable

        public boolean isCellEditable(TreePath path,
                     int columnIndex)
        Returns false. Returns true if the cell at path and columnIndex is editable.
        Specified by:
        isCellEditable in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the node.
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        true if the cell may be edited.

      • isColumnFirstOrdered

        public boolean isColumnFirstOrdered(int columnIndex)
        Returns false. Determine if the column is the first ordered column.
        Specified by:
        isColumnFirstOrdered in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
        Returns:
        true if the column is the primary ordering.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        This method causes listeners to re-query the entire model by firing a structure changed event for the root.

      • removeTreeModelListener

        public void removeTreeModelListener(TreeModelListener l)
        Description copied from interface: TreeModel
        Removes a listener previously added with addTreeModelListener(). If the listener was not previously added, no action is taken.
        Specified by:
        removeTreeModelListener in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        l - The listener.

      • setOrderedColumn

        public void setOrderedColumn(int columnIndex)
        Does nothing. Set the ordered column. If the column is already ordered, toggle the ordering mode, otherwise sort SortOrder.ASCENDING.
        Specified by:
        setOrderedColumn in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.

      • setOrderedColumn

        public void setOrderedColumn(int columnIndex,
                    SortOrder order)
        Does nothing. Sets the column for ordering and an explicit order mode. If the model does not support this, an empty implementation is sufficient. However, no sorting will be performed.
        Specified by:
        setOrderedColumn in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The column index for ordering
        order - The order mode.

      • setValueAt

        public void setValueAt(Object aValue,
              TreePath path,
              int columnIndex)
        If the column index is zero, calls valueForPathChanged otherwise does nothing. Sets the value in the cell at columnIndex and path to aValue
        Specified by:
        setValueAt in interface TreeModel
        Parameters:
        aValue - The new value for the column.
        path - The path to the node.
        columnIndex - The index of the column, zero being the first column.
